actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption for purposes of the Federal estate tax and to increase the estate tax marital deduction.

summary.text: Increases the value of exemptions for taxable estates under the Internal Revenue Code from $60,000 to $200,000 of the value of the gross estate. Increases the limitation on the aggregate marital deduction to 50 percent of the adjusted gross value of the estate, plus $100,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption for purposes of the Federal estate tax and to increase the estate tax marital deduction.
